liquibase.change.DropDefaultValueChange

liquibase.change.DropDefaultValueChange Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.change.DropDefaultValueChange:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Removes the default value from an existing column.

Definition at line 29 of file DropDefaultValueChange.java.
